name: Arcade Knight (Benstrange, Pratixel, VictorRache, Chewayil)
description:
A dark wizard turned your princess into a chicken. You have to find the right one in order to save her.

Controls: 

  • Mouse : drag and drop coins
  • Q : move the knight to the left
  • D : move the knight to the right
  • Space : jump

Team : 

  • @Lucas "VicRache" Colomer: Dev
  • @Benstrange : Dev
  • @Pratixel : Artist
  • @Chewayil : Artist

Crédits : 

  • Musics : https://retroindiejosh.itch.io/free-music-pack-3
  • Sounds : https://freesound.org

PS: Better performance on Windows
